credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Stedelijk Museum Amsterdam. Tadanori Yokoo. 22/2/t/m 14/4 1974
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
description: Predominantly black poster with text: "Stedelijk Museum Amsterdam: Tadanori Yokoo 22 2 tm  14 4 1974" across top. Central, red, blue, green geometric shapes above a green triangle enclosing red and blue hands. Photograph of the artist on lower left-hand side, and yellow representation of diety Jibbo Kannon.
name: Poster
